segments.text: What do you want to do to celebrate Christmas ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll have supper with my girlfriend and go shopping . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll go to church first and then go to a Christmas party . Would you like to come ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd love to . But I am going to meet my girlfriend right now . See you later .
segments.speaker: S2
